column1: The Pit Room////That being said DO NOT SKIP OUT ON THE BRISKET. That was hands down my favorite
column2: SO TENDER. SO FLAVORFUL. AMAZING. But!!! The recommendation from the gentlemen behind the counter was foe the Turkey. Honestly
column3: I was iffy about it. Not really excited. IT WAS AMAZING. I HIGHLY recommend you try it. I can't believe that would have been one of my last choices here.
